Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, we're offering it to you at a special price of $11,500. We're confident this offer will allow us to share the value of this product with you while ensuring a fair return for us. We look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
